articles.description: Paul Pogba is out of contract in 2022 and Manchester United know they lack leverage as they risk losing him for nothing in 12 months' time, just as they did nine years ago to Juventus.
articles.content:
Paul Pogba could leave Manchester United for Juventus as early as this summer, a new report reveals. 
The Frenchman made the switch from Manchester to Turin as an academy star back in 2012 and Itali… [+2419 chars]

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: "I've never seen that before" - Declan Rice explains Jordan Henderson hope - Mirror Online
articles.description: West Ham stalwart Declan Rice has formed a strong bond with Jordan Henderson while on England duty and claims the Liverpool captain brings vital "intensity" and "leadership" to the Three Lions set-up
articles.content:
West Ham star Declan Rice admits he is regularly amazed by Jordan Henderson's "intensity" - and says he's "praying" the "world-class" Liverpool captain will be available for this summer's Euros.

articles.title: Nate Diaz's insult to Leon Edwards backfires as fight is booked for UFC 262 - Mirror Online
articles.description: Diaz last month claimed not not know who the Brit was but will now face him over five rounds on May 15
articles.content:
Nate Diaz has agreed to face Leon Edwards at UFC 262 -a month after claiming he didn't know who the Brit was.

articles.title: Memphis Depay could be surprise Liverpool transfer to repeat Mohamed Salah move - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool and FSG's transfer strategy during their Anfield tenure has always been clear, and is unlikely to change significantly ahead of the summer transfer window
articles.content:
As Liverpool seek to add to their forward options this summer, plenty of names have been linked with a move to Anfield.
